textbox.label: Font size
textbox.help: The size (in pixels) of the font.

textbox.label: Line height
textbox.help: The vertical distance between lines of text measured in ratio to the font-size. '1' equals the same line height as font size.

textbox.label: 'Read more' link label
textbox.help: The link will point to either 'Landing page content' or 'Link to web page' but not both.

listbox.label: Text wrap
listbox.help: Wraps text to the full width of line immedately below the image.

textbox.label: Max width
textbox.help: The maximum width of the image (in pixels). This value is ignored when 'Position' is set to 'Above'. In that case the maxwidth will become the width of it's container.
textbox.regexerror: Please enter a whole number only.

textbox.label: Font Size
textbox.help: The size (in pixels) of the font.

textbox.label: Line height
textbox.help: The vertical distance between lines of text measured in ratio to the font-size. '1' equals the same line height as font size.

textbox.label: Bottom Padding
textbox.help: The vertical distance (in pixels) between the title and the content below it.

textbox.help: The size (in pixels) of the font.

textbox.help: The vertical distance between lines of text measured in ratio to the font-size. '1' equals the same line height as font size.

textbox.label: Border width
textbox.help: The width (in pixels) of a border surrounding the inside edges of the article.

textbox.label: Width
textbox.help: Fixed width (in pixels) of the button. Button size adjusts automatically if left blank.

textbox.label: Border width
textbox.help: The width (in pixels) of a border surrounding the inside edges of the area around the button.

textbox.label: Right
textbox.help: The horizontal space (in pixels) to the right of this 's container.

textbox.label: Left
textbox.help: The horizontal space (in pixels) to the left of this section's container.

textbox.label: Bottom
textbox.help: The vertical space (in pixels) below this section container.

textbox.label: Top
textbox.help: The vertical space (in pixels) inside the top of this section's container.

textbox.help: The vertical space (in pixels) at the bottom of this section's container.

textbox.label: Right
textbox.help: The horizontal space (in pixels) inside the right edge of this section's container.

textbox.label: Left
textbox.help: How much horizontal whitespace should there be on the left side of the email?

textbox.label: Other heading font family
textbox.help: ^Other must be selected above

textbox.label: Font size
textbox.help: The size (in pixels) of 'Titles' in articles. The font-size of h1, h2, etc. are not defined. You may define these yourself under 'Custom CSS'.

textbox.label: Line height
textbox.help: The vertical distance between lines of text measured in ratio to the font-size. '1' equals the same line height as font size.

textbox.label: Bottom padding
textbox.help: The vertical space (in pixels) below the title.

textbox.label: Width of sections
textbox.help: The maximum width (measured in pixels) that each of the sections of your mailout will inherit.

textbox.label: Border width
textbox.help: The width (in pixels) of a border surrounding the inside edges of the main section.

textbox.label: Border width
textbox.help: The width (in pixels) of a border surrounding the inside edges of the main section.

textbox.label: Width
textbox.help: The width of the sidebar (in pixels) from border to border

textbox.label: Border width
textbox.help: The width (in pixels) of a border surrounding the inside edges of the main section.
